item.p: Vellum, about 13 3/4 in. by 10 1/4 consisting of 172 leaves, some of which are slightly stained and torn, especially foll. 60, 107, and 172. The quires, signed with letters, are 18 in number. Leaves are wanting after foll. 10, 25, and 30. Each page is divided into two columns, of from 18 to 20 lines. This volume is written in. a large, regular Estranglea of the xith cent., with numerous Syriac vowels and other marks.

revisionDesc.change: The Syriac copied from the Word Document needs to be checked for accuracy (#131, #133, #140)
